column4:
['Aao bachcho aaj tumhe', '
Ek kahani sunata hoon main', '
Sher ki kahani sunoge', '
Hoon', 'Hoon hoon', '
Mere pass aao mere', '
Dosto ek kissa suno', '
Mere pass aao mere', '
Dosto ek kissa suno', 'Kai saal pehle ki ye baat hai', '
Bolo na chup kyon ho gaye', '
Bhayanak andheri', '
Si yeh raat mein', '
Liye apni bandook', '
Main haath mein', '
Ghane jangalon se guzarata', '
Hua kahi ja raha tha', '
Ghane jangalon se guzarata', '
Hua kahi ja raha tha', '
Ja raha tha', '
Nahi aa raha tha', '
Nahi ja raha tha', 'Uff fo aage bhi to bolo na', '
Batata hu bata hu', 'Nahi bhulti uf wo jungale ki raat', '
Muje yaad hai wo thi mangal ki raat', '
Chala ja raha tha me darta', '
Hua hanuman chalisa padhta hua', '
Bolo hanuman ki jai', '
Jai jai bajrangbali ki jai', '
Haa bolo hanuman ki jai', '
Bolo bajrangbali ki jai', 'Ghadi thi andhera magar sakt tha', '
Koi das sava das ka bus waqt tha', 'Larazata tha koyal ki bhi kook se', '
Bura haal hua us pe bhookh se', '
Laga todane ek beri se ber', '
Mere saamne a gaya ek sher', 'Koi gighghi banati nazar phir gayi', '
To bandook bhi haath se gir gayi', 'Main lapka wo jhapka', '
Main upar wo neeche', '
Woh aage main peechhe', '
Main ped pe wo peechhe', '
Are bachaao are bachaao', '
Main daal daal wo paat paat', '
Main paseena wo baag baag', '
Main sur mein wo taal mein', '
Yeh jungal paataal mein', '
Bachaao bachaao', '
Are bhaago re bhaago', '
Are bhaago', 'Phir kya hua', '
Khuda ki kasam maza', '
Aa gaya mujhe maar kar', '
Besharam kha gaya', '
Kha gaya lekin', '
Aap to zinda hain', '
Are ye jeena bhi koi', '
Jeena hai lallu aain']
